{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3525993,"name":"Mohammed","username":"Mohammed","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mohammed/{size}/255781_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-13T14:24:47.949Z","cooked":"

I wrote this in one line

and once i deployed the code it formatted it into smaller chunks with additional lines, how do i disable this formatting?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2025-02-13T14:24:47.949Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":15,"reads":94,"readers_count":93,"score":93.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":491523,"topic_slug":"how-to-disable-code-formatting-on-deploy","display_username":"Mohammed","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":61815,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3065 Lead Programmer | Alumni"},"post_url":"/t/how-to-disable-code-formatting-on-deploy/491523/1","custom_user_title":"3065 Lead Programmer | Alumni","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3526094,"name":"Matt Soucy (he/him)","username":"msoucy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/msoucy/{size}/237623_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-13T15:55:56.898Z","cooked":"

In VS Code, press ctrl-, and then search for “format on save” in the settings menu.

However, I don’t believe that’s enabled by default, so I’d double-check to make sure that there isn’t a particular reason that it’s enabled (like a mentor or other team member)

I see that you are using AdvantageKit, which means you’ve probably used a template build.gradle with spotless. You can remove that. Just look up the spotless config (should be towards the bottom) and comment it out, or change the settings.
